website_summaries.verdict: Great value for good ovulation strips. This kit also includes some bonus pregnancy test strips.
pros: The strips are easy to use
Test line clearly gets darker as your luteinizing hormone (LH) builds up and you get closer to ovulation
cons: Several buyers noted that the pregnancy test strips gave some false positives

customer_reviews.title: These strips work
customer_reviews.text: These strips work amazing. The first month I used them, I just guessed when I should ovulate and I started testing and reading the strips myself which they are easy to read but was not successful the first month. The second month I started testing right after my period and downloaded the app that comes with the kit and it reads the strips for you and tells you when you peak. So the first month that I tested everyday and used the app, I conceived. Currently 6 weeks and couldn’t be more excited. I highly recommend this kit and to use the app because it is extremely easy and helpful.
customer_reviews.author: Krista

customer_reviews.title: PREGNANCY TEST STRIPS DO NOT WORK
customer_reviews.text: I used 3 strips a day after my missed period and all were negative. Ran to target to pick up a few things and after having a head ache for two days straight I decided to throw a set of first response tests into my basket and they were both positive!! DO NOT BUY THESE. Just to test them out again I did three more tonight and all were negative. Just an awful experience. VERY disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pregnancy tests do NOT work
customer_reviews.text: This product does not deserve any stars. Those were my clear blue tests after a First Response. I used the strips and got nothing. I do plan to see my doctor today but how can a batch of test say I'm pregnant and a strip say I'm not? I've never got thenovulation strips to work either and I follow the directions as exact as possible. Wish i could get my money back on these because they're a joke. Never again will I buy these.
customer_reviews.author: Katrina Wolfe

customer_reviews.title: One Star is One too Many
customer_reviews.text: I agree with the general consensus of reviews. this product accurately detected by LH levels but I was five days late and THREE other tests told me I was positive (First Response, Equate, and Meijer brand). I'm not 8 weeks pregnant and still getting negative results on these tests, they simply don't work at detecting HCG levels and quite frankly should be dropped by amazon and never sold. If anyone knows how to report this to the FDA I'd love too....
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy these!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: The pregnancy test gave me a false positive, we have been trying for years now so when I got the positive I was very emotional. Then I realized that I wasn't actually pregnant and I was heart broken.
customer_reviews.author: Sara uhles

customer_reviews.title: Surging for 10 days?
customer_reviews.text: I took the ovulation tests for 10 straight days and continuously got strong positives. I tried at different times of the day, drinking more and less water. I started to get worried that my hormone levels might be going crazy and I called my doctor. She recommended trying a different brand. I did and it showed no surge, side by side with one of this brand that was, again, very strongly positive. These were very clearly defective.
customer_reviews.author: wimberjc

customer_reviews.title: Pregnant in the first month of using this product!!!
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with this product. I received very consistent results from both the ovulation tests and the pregnancy tests. The ovulation line is very dark and easy to read, and the pregnancy test picked up 2 days before expected period ( I think this is amazing considering the price is so affordable too). I have been trying for 4 months and this was the first month using this product and now I'm pregnant. All I changed was that I used this product together with Pre-seed lubricant. I am unbelievably excited and hope others benefit from this product. I highly recommend it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Radina Johnson

customer_reviews.title: HCG STRIPS DID NOT WORK
customer_reviews.text: Only deserves 1 star. Ovulation strips worked well but when it came to test hcg for pregnancy they did not work! I took other tests from first response including digital and they were all positive on the same date as the easy@home brand. Clearly they are not as sensitive as they say for early detection or they don't work at all!!! DO NOT BUY FOR HCG TESTS
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: False negatives
customer_reviews.text: ovulation tests worked great however the pregnancy tests are not. I have had several positives on other tests but these ones continue to be the FAINTEST line that almost just looks like a shadow without any darkening as the days go on sometimes it just looks completely negative and other tests continue to be positive and darkening as well.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Davis

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: They’re defective. I’m pregnant and have been taking these since 8 dpo none of them came out positive. Still saying negative at 10 weeks pregnant 🤦🏼‍♀️
customer_reviews.author: Cheyenne Miller

customer_reviews.title: Worked for me!
customer_reviews.text: Got pregnant my first month using them, not as convenient as the digital sticks but much cheaper and I thought I would be using them longer than I actually needed to. I used them with the plastic bathroom mouthwash cups from the grocery store.
customer_reviews.author: SamTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Baby is due in June  :-)
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product at the end of July 2019, and conceived by Sept 2019. Prior to using this product, I was relying on the Flo app to track my cycles. After using this ovulation kit, I found that the Flo app was actually a few days off, and wasn't accurately predicting my fertility window. This is a great resource and I highly recommend it to anyone trying to conceive.
customer_reviews.author: Rosie

customer_reviews.title: Not very sensitive
customer_reviews.text: The pregnancy test included in this kit Must have a really high HCG threshold because I am seven weeks pregnant with highCG levels and it still shows up negative! The ovulation test strips never showed a positive despite testing daily so I would think that they are not very accurate as well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Useless
customer_reviews.text: WASTE OF MONEY! I was 6 weeks pregnant (confirmed by doctor) before this test even showed a faint positive sign and non of my ovulation test ever worked either. Complete waste of money
customer_reviews.author: Kayla N.

customer_reviews.title: Awful pregnancy tests, decent ovulation tests
customer_reviews.text: The ovulation tests seem to work ok. I normally get wondfo pregnancy/ovulation tests but ended up buying these by accident. The pregnancy tests are AWFUL, I came up positive on first response, clear blue, clear blue digital, a cheap wondfo test, and a .98 cheep one from Walmart, but not on these. I’ve been getting positives for 3 days now but still not on these. I think they must need far more hcg than any other test I’ve used. If they don’t work the dual pack is useless to me. Returning and going back to my wondfo tests if needed.
customer_reviews.author: AHarper

customer_reviews.title: HCG strips DONT work
customer_reviews.text: The HCG strips dont work at all. I took one with FMU on the day my period was due and it was clearly negative (not even a tiny faint line-nothing). Couple hours later I took a first response and got a positive in under 60sec. This was a waste
customer_reviews.author: Dakota Zinn

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work for me
customer_reviews.text: A coworker of mine had told me about these because they were cheaper and you get so many in the box. The first month of trying them, they were heard to tell if I was actually ovulating or not, so I paired it with a name brand. This month, I had signs that I was close to ovulating so I decided to use the name brand one, along with these. Good thing I used the other kind because if I just depended on these, I would have missed my window. These might work great for some people, but they didn't work for me.
customer_reviews.author: Meg203

customer_reviews.title: Not reliable...
customer_reviews.text: I test results of the HCG strips are highly unreliable. I tested with a digital and got the result "pregnant" whereas the strips showed negative. I am already past my period date so these tests are not sensitive at all.
customer_reviews.author: Barbie

customer_reviews.title: Something wrong with the test strips
customer_reviews.text: I had used this product before when i bought the ovulation strips alone. They worked. But I bought the pregnancy and ovulation kit for when the old ones ran out. I’ve tried these three months in a row now and they are duds. Bad quality. I Tested every day and it never said I was ovulating or close to it. Half the time I had error with the app trying to read the strip and the control line was so faint it barely showed up. There was no test line ever. It was a waste of money and it’s frustrating when you are trying to get pregnant and using inaccurate And unreliable products.
customer_reviews.author: Leah

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed at all
customer_reviews.text: I took a number of the pregnancy tests thinking I was pregnant. None of them came back positive. I waited another week and used 2 more strips. Both negative. I waited a couple more days and then started getting sick in the mornings. Since I already have gone through this once before I knew I was pregnant right then and there. I went to the drugstore and bought 2 tests there. Both came back postive within 45 seconds of taking them.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Ovulation tests are great, pregnancy tests are AWFUL.
customer_reviews.text: Ovulation tests are great, pregnancy tests are AWFUL. I was very pregnant twice and had incredibly healthy baby boys, and during no point in my first trimester did the lines on the pregnancy test turn anything more than faint. Don’t waste the extra money on this combo - just get the ovulation strips and stick with First Response and Clear Blue for reliable pregnancy tests!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ovulation strips didn't work- WASTE OF MONEY.
customer_reviews.text: The ovulation strips were defective. I would test everyday at the exact same time in the afternoon and everyday it would bounce around. One day the test line would be dark, then the next day it would very faint, then the following day back up to dark again. Waste of money, don't buy.
customer_reviews.author: JME33

customer_reviews.title: Don’t Stress
customer_reviews.text: Read a ton of reviews prior to purchasing...people claiming to have conceived on the first cycle of tracking. I took three cycles to get pregnant, which is still amazing! What I’m getting at is, don’t be worried if it doesn’t happen right away. Even if you do everything right, there’s still only about a 25% of conceiving! I do love this product and subsequent app. Very easy to use and input. Anyone saying otherwise is probably not fully following the directions and suggestions. You’ll find when the best time for you to test is, and you’ll start to be more aware of the signs your body gives you leading to ovulation. All in all, great product with great results.
customer_reviews.author: Chloe

customer_reviews.title: Pregnant Skeptic
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical at first because my lh levels were much more up and down then what you see in their promotional materials. I got a second surge this month (for the second time) and actually called my doctor concerned about my hormones. My doctor felt like testing everyday might not be the best idea. Too much information is not always a good thing. Fair point. So, I was considering getting a different testing kit when I found out I was pregnant! Turns out my second surge this month was just the lh strip picking up the hcg. I used this and Pre-seed lube for three cycles and it worked. I would recommend it anyone who is trying!
customer_reviews.author: Adrianna

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Not a fan. I wouldn’t spend the money again on these. Ovulation BARELY showed up, it wasn’t very dark, and I am still not getting positive hcg readings even though I am very much pregnant.
customer_reviews.author: Gabbie

customer_reviews.title: ALWAYS positive
customer_reviews.text: I have used these ovulation tests for almost 6 months. Super disappointed in the new box I got. The ovulation tests are ALWAYS positive. These are going in the garbage.
customer_reviews.author: rachelkhays

customer_reviews.title: Great ovulation test, terrible hcg test!
customer_reviews.text: The ovulation test were fantastic and worked great. However the pregnancy test were terrible. Using the same urine sample I did a clear blue digital test and rapid test and the easy @ home test. The clear blues showing positive and the digital one saying pregnant, but the easy @ home one hardly showing a faint line at all. I never leave reviews but I felt so discouraged using the easy@home ones getting negatives for the last few days and others showing positive. I highly recommend the ovulation test though.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: False Negative!! Over and over.
customer_reviews.text: These do not work! The pregnancy tests gave me false negative results. After my period was late, I took 3 tests a day. I followed the directions to the letter! I was pregnant for 6 weeks and kept getting negative results. I finally took a generic pregnancy test from the drug store and found out I was pregnant. I wish I would have known sooner because I would have changed my lifestyle for the weeks I was unknowingly pregnant. Do not trust these results. Do yourself a favor and get slightly more expensive and reliable pregnancy tests!!
customer_reviews.author: Jacq C

customer_reviews.title: Pregnancy tests give false positives
customer_reviews.text: The ovulation strips work as intended. My issue is with the pregnancy strips. They gave me false positives. I am not talking about evap lines. These positives were literally pink lines! I went two days thinking I was pregnant. I then started bleeding and began thinking I was having an early miscarriage. I ran and took two different kinds of EPT and they both came back clear NO. EPT has greater sensitivity levels than these strips so I trust their product. I was never pregnant. This product is not worth it. It will give you false hope. Stay away.
customer_reviews.author: JCB143029

customer_reviews.title: I CAN FINALLY JOIN THE CLUB!!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been stalking the reviews of OPK kits and dreaming about the day I can write a positive review (crazy? maybe!) but after just one month, we are pregnant. I had never used an OPK and strongly recommend this brand. Worked perfectly. Pregnancy tests started worked at 6 days before my missed period!! I can finally write my own review and send positive vibes to those who were in my shoes dying for their chance to write this!!
customer_reviews.author: Nick & Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I tired to conceive for a few months before trying this kit. We were successful the first month of using it! I would highly recommend this kit. It helped me to narrow my ovulation day down. It comes with so many tests, both ovulation and pregnancy ones. I got my first positive 11 DPO using the tests strips in this kit. It was faint but there. I used a walmart pregnancy test and it was also a faint positive. The line only got darker as my pregnancy has progressed. I am currently about 5 weeks pregnant and praying all will go well.
customer_reviews.author: Sirena

customer_reviews.title: Great for ovulation tests, awful for pregnancy tests
customer_reviews.text: These ovulation strips are great! Super accurate and I've had two successful pregnancies using these on the FIRST try. Highly recommend! This box also comes with about 20 pregnancy tests which are garbage. Both pregnancies, these strips have not picked up on my hormone levels. I have taken Clearblue tests both times with positive results, when these strips are STILL showing negative. I just don't think they're strong enough to pick up on early HCG levels where the drugstore tests are. Just keep that in mind!
customer_reviews.author: EEAO

customer_reviews.title: LH readings are always zero.
customer_reviews.text: I've been using these and every single reading has been zero. The online information isn't very helpful claiming this isn't how the reading is supposed to go and could be defective product. That means the window has been missed and that it will be a whole month until we try again. I do not reccomended this product because when it comes to reliability, I need a product that can deliver.
customer_reviews.author: JH

customer_reviews.title: WOULD RECOMMEND!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely relied on this kit and it worked within a month! My periods have always been irregular in terms of some are 28 days, 30 days, 32 days, 35 days so it was always hard to find out when I would “ovulate.” When we decided on “trying” this kit helped me confirm the ovulation dates and we were pregnant after the first month! Please watch the YouTube video by Victoria Ciftci on how to track your fertility it helped me become organized. This was just my experience! I hope and pray everyone has the same. Blessings!
customer_reviews.author: jessica pu

customer_reviews.title: Very Helpful to those who are TTC.
customer_reviews.text: Been TTC for about a year, and this thing really helped us a lot. I was using flo app to track my ovulation day and found out that I’m ovulating 2 days earlier. I tried just the ovulation strips on August but was not successfull at all so I bought another one again with the pregnancy test this time. So thankful I did! We are finally pregant and couldn’t be any more happier! Praying for a healthy and safe pregnancy! And baby dust to everyone who’s trying TTC, Keep trying you guys!
customer_reviews.author: Brice

customer_reviews.title: Let absorb for longer than 5 seconds!
customer_reviews.text: Takes a time or two to get the hang of using these, but once you figure out how they work, I think they’re great. I love love love the app that works in conjunction with the strips (read: no more keeping per soaked strips in a notebook to chart levels!) Pro tip: let the strip absorb for about 10 Mississippi’s. 5 seconds is nowhere near enough time to collect enough urine for an accurate reading. I haven’t had a positive Hcg test, but it’s only my second cycle using these. I’m really thankful for the data they’re providing thus-far.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher

customer_reviews.title: Best test for anyone planning to conceive
customer_reviews.text: We used this test kit to plan our first baby, where were able to track the ovulation and eventually getting the pregnancy result. The results were accurate, infact we ordered same kit for our second baby too, luckily we were able to conceive in the first month itself. I highly recommend this test kit for anyone who is planning to conceive. One suggestion is that try to run the tests in the morning when you wake up, because the hormones are concentrated and get a better and reliable results. If you drink plenty of water and test it then the line will be lighter.
customer_reviews.author: Roopa Gowda

customer_reviews.title: WORKS AMAZING
customer_reviews.text: Got pregnant same month I started using this product. I unfortunately had 2 miscarriages back to back. But am currently pregnant again and, 15 weeks long with a healthy baby girl. The ovulation and, pregnant tests are very accurate and, reliable. We tried for a year with no luck and, got pregnant 3 times within 7 months using these :)
customer_reviews.author: Shi

customer_reviews.title: Unreliable HCG tests
customer_reviews.text: While I found the lh strips great for detecting my ovulation, the hcg strips are NOT what they are made out to be. After receiving a positive on a First Response Early Result, Equate brand AND a Clear Blue digital (which CB requires more hcg than what these strips advertise) I was getting an extremely faint almost barely there line with these hcg strips. All of my tests were taken after missed period and with first morning urine. I would imagine this would be very disheartening for women only testing using these strips. I would use these again for the ovulation tests only and only use trusted brand Pregnancy tests, remember quality not quantity!
customer_reviews.author: Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Works well!
customer_reviews.text: Used these for the pregnancy test and ovulation. In the image is the pregnancy tests. I highly suggest these and then you can take the more expensive ones if you see a faint line. Notice that on 9 DPO I got a faint line and took a First response test and got a positive. I’ve had a hard time ovulating and started taking Clomid. I would get frustrated with ovulation strips because they would never be positive. After taking Clomid, I ovulated and it showed perfectly that I was surging on the strip. I got pregnant the 2nd month of tracking!
customer_reviews.author: CarlyCNguyenAmazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pretty sure they don't work
customer_reviews.text: Two months with no ovulation? Followed directions like an intelligent adult. I think these don't actually work...
customer_reviews.author: Thoughtful

customer_reviews.title: Pregnant the first month! After 7 years TTC and 33 years old!
customer_reviews.text: We have been trying without help for 7 years (naturally) to no avail. I finally decided to try this time with ovulation strips. We are pregnant the first month!!!!!! I must note that my husband was on the blue stork fertility tea a week prior to ovulation, we used pre-seed a couple of times around ovulation and most notably, we took 50 mg of clomid (this was also our first round or clomid) and we were pregnant our first month. I am 33 years old and suffered from PCOS induced anovulatory infertility. I hope this product and my story can help another to get pregnant.
customer_reviews.author: Tisha

customer_reviews.title: Not accurate
customer_reviews.text: All pregnant tests gave false negatives. I am pregnant but questioned it for weeks because of these tests. Even now I took one and it is still negative after confirming it with my ob
customer_reviews.author: Trisha Smith

customer_reviews.title: HCG doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: The HCG strips aren't good one bit. They keep saying negative for over a month now then o decided to buy a regular test and there were my 2 bright lines giving me a positive reading. Totally waste of money and time.
customer_reviews.author: Kellie

customer_reviews.title: HCG TESTS GIVE FALSE POSITIVES
customer_reviews.text: These were the “positives” I got from easy@home. Taken within the time frame and back to back. I had a blood test same day - negative - my level was less than 2. Was still getting these “positives” after my negative blood test. I was not pregnant. I stopped using this brand because they are absolutely horrible and give women false hope. It was absolutely heart breaking to start my day thinking I was pregnant and then finding out the same day I was not via a blood test. This happened 2 months in a row with separate batches of tests. Absolutely horrible and will never purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Autumn

customer_reviews.title: Worked for us!
customer_reviews.text: I was fortunate enough to not have any trouble conceiving our first child, but had been on birth control and had irregular periods when I wasn't since he was born almost 4 years ago. Decided to get off birth control in June and start tracking in July. Luckily started testing just before ovulating! The app made it super easy to track everything and at 10 dpo I had a super faint line that I couldn't discern if it was a positive. Bought a FRER and got a positive that day and the next day got a more evident positive on the easy at home test. 12 dpo today and keeping fingers crossed everything goes well 😊
customer_reviews.author: Adrienne

customer_reviews.title: Easy and reliable!
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I needed just a few months to conceive using this kit. I'm 41, and I was all prepared for it to take much longer or maybe not even work at all (it's my first pregnancy). But the sticks gave me very reliable results about my ovulation and fertile window and apparently we were able to time it just right. The hCG test came back positive on the first day of my missed period. The tests are super easy to use, just make sure you take photos for the app in the same location under the same kind of light.
customer_reviews.author: Ricarda F.

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: Can’t believe I’m actually typing this but I got pregnant after the very first cycle. It 100% worked and helped, in my experience! I’d recommend that when you log the test strip, you set it down and have the app automatically take the picture and then you can adjust the bars so it is accurate. I realized that before using this, I was just relying on my period app and the ovulation dates were WAY off, which explains a lot. I highly recommend this!
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa

customer_reviews.title: Got my BFP!!
customer_reviews.text: I used these since starting TTC last November and just got my BFP this week! I was on birth control for almost 5 years and had long, irregular cycles coming off it. Without these strips, I NEVER would have known when I was ovulating. Come to find out, most cycles I ovulated around Day 20. I was having long cycles but this month something told me to start OPK testing earlier. I randomly ovulated on day 14, BD'd, and ended up conceiving! I'm so grateful for these! They were affordable and I loved using the premom app.
customer_reviews.author: Emma Hawke

customer_reviews.title: Hcg not as described
customer_reviews.text: LH tests are accurate and quickly developed, however hcg tests are not sensitive as described. Did not show pos until my hcg hit 140. At 470 it still just shows a very faint positive. I would not recommend the HCG strips to ANYONE. Their app is not user friendly, far better apps available for free.
customer_reviews.author: Amy T

customer_reviews.title: Feel confident with the test set!
customer_reviews.text: I highly recommend easy@home for anyone trying! It is accurate, easy to use and I love the amount of tests your get for the money! It really helps you feel confident in when to try, in your body and when you ovulated. I wasn’t quite sure what day I ovulated because my cycle fluctuated about 6 days. I kept a personal chart and know this helped us conceive faster than if we hadn’t used it. We were able to get pregnant our FIRST month TTC!!!! So thankful for it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Confusing Results
customer_reviews.text: The ovulation strips seem to work well, but the pregnancy strips are impossible to interpret. I tested 12 days after having an IUI. Within the 5 minute period, I saw the faintest of faint test lines, barely perceptible. I had no idea how to interpret that, so I tested again the next day - same result, the line was so faint I had no idea what to think. I figured it was a negative, but decided to run out and buy a backup tester just to make sure. So glad I did, because I got a clear, positive result from First Response! Shame on the manufacturers of Easy@Home for making such a confusing, easy-to-misinterpret test.
customer_reviews.author: SRae

customer_reviews.title: Definitely NOT a good purchase 😐😐
customer_reviews.text: Horrible waste of money for the product. The suggested premom app takes more time for the test strip to read than it takes to actually get pregnant. Had to take SEVERAL pictures in the so called easy green areas for it to finally read. This was the same tumultuous process for 3 days. Takes entirely too long. I'll just spend the extra money and get a digital one like I've used before. Disappointed 😞. This seemed based on how it was advertised very simple and quick. Couldn't believe I had to pee in a cup in 2020. Don't waste your money or time.
customer_reviews.author: Stefanie Miller

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Bought these three years ago and didn’t have any problems. This time, half of them are “invalid.” I also have the Pregmate strips (I use one of each brand when I’m testing to compare). Pregmate never gives an “invalid” result. Thought I’d buy the Easy at Home this time around because they worked for me last time and are less expensive. They ended up being a complete waste of money. They must have changed the way they make the strips in the last three years. When it comes to my fertility and trying to conceive, I don’t have time to waste...
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: SERIOUSLY PULL THE BAD BATCH AND GIVE PEOPLE BACK THEIR MONEY
customer_reviews.text: Got a faint positive on pregnancy test strip and then I read the reviews and checked my batch number..... why has the bad batch not been pulled yet!?!?! In case you don't know when you are trying to get pregnant and then think you are, but you are not it is heartbreaking and then to add injury to insult these are still being sold. If you have a soul you will pull these, send an email, apologize and refund.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Test results are confusing.
customer_reviews.text: I’m confused about the test results. There are multiple tabs to track your test strips, easy@home, PreMom, and Other. The e@h tab results are 0.1-0.5 where the Premom tab lists the results as 5-17.5. I don’t know which set of results to trust and which is more accurate. Very frustrating when trying to conceive.
customer_reviews.author: Kara B

customer_reviews.title: It Works!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought the ovulation test because I wasn't sure my phone app was enough for tracking fertility. The reviews were so great that I just had to try. It worked the first month!!!! As you can see from the pictures, 10/11/18 and 10/12/18 were my peak days. Then on 11/1/18 and 11/2/18, I took a test and it was positive! I also followed up with a Clear Blue test which was also positive. I just can't believe and I am ecstatic. I can't say enough good things about the tests. Thanks Easy@home! I will be sure to tell everyone about you. My first doctor appt. is this week so I am keeping my fingers crossed that everything is a go.
customer_reviews.author: Lagniappe_girl

customer_reviews.title: It works!!!
customer_reviews.text: Well I have to say it.. this works!! I got mine just a few weeks ago, Sept 8th to be exact and I tested positive today. There is a few things to consider, first all my other apps (glow, flo, etc..) were wrong, I was not ovulating when they said. Also please don't trust their pregnancy tests, I'm 10 days post ovulation and still negative. However fr and cb are both positive and I didn't even use my first pee... If you wanna have a baby BUY this NOW!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pregnancy test gives false negatives
customer_reviews.text: Well I’m 6 weeks pregnant and the hcg strips keep saying negative .... it’s very bad because I was doing pregnancy tests for a week and all negative and I couldn’t understand why worst thing is that I could damage the baby as I was taking pills and medications as I thought I was not pregnant very disappointed I would sue the company to be honest
customer_reviews.author: Olivia Molina

customer_reviews.title: They did the job
customer_reviews.text: They work great. I was able to detect my surge each month and never ran into any faulty strips or anything. The only thing I didn’t like and the reason why I stopped using these is because I had to limit my water intake way too much so my urine wouldn’t be diluted. I used them for 3 months and didn’t get pregnant, it actually happened the month after I stopped using them so it’s OK if you don’t get pregnant the first few months, just be patient.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie Urena

customer_reviews.title: Ovulation tests
customer_reviews.text: So far I have liked the accuracy of the ovulation tests thus far over a popular brand (Clearblue) as if you use the app and take good pictures of the strips I think they are more accurate. Clearblue will not show you a drop in fertility if you have abnormal cycles and this does a better job. Example: If Clearblue detects a LH surge and notes “high” fertility it will continue to show “high” until a peak...even if you may not truly be in a high fertility time. These tests appear to be more accurate in showing you a low, high and peak fertility and less expensive. I can’t speak much on the pregnancy tests yet.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney B

customer_reviews.title: Accurate results
customer_reviews.text: I was trying for 3-4 months with no success. I purchased these to find out when I was ovulating when I was “supposed” to. Turns out, I ovulate 3 days after. These pregnancy tests were taken 2,3, and 4 days after my missed period. I bought these in September and pregnant in October!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pregnant after 4 months
customer_reviews.text: Follow the instructions and it does what it’s meant for. To get the most accurate results it’s important to take the test around the same time every day when you think it’s ovulation time. At first, it was hard to tell what was “peak” but then the app got an update so now it tells you when you take the picture in the PreMom app. Take the out the guess work and get in the know on your ovulation. My doc said it could take a year to get preggo but I was pregnant within 4 months after using this kit. I now have a healthy, beautiful baby boy :)
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Cee Cee

customer_reviews.title: Pregnant First Try In My Life!
customer_reviews.text: I am in shock. I have one ovary, I'm 38 years old, almost 39, and have 4 blood clotting disorders. I have never tried to get pregnant before, but of course life doesn't care how old you are when you meet your person! I thought I had a slim chance at best of getting pregnant. I went off the mini pill in December, had my first period January 16th, and started testing 8 days after. Got a dark positive ovulation test 11 days after, and got a positive pregnancy test on Valentine's day! I am in absolute shock. (In a good way!) I would recommend these tests to anyone! The stars indicate our "tries to conceive" 🙂 Good luck everyone!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worked 100% for me
customer_reviews.text: These helped me conceive 4 weeks after trashing my birth control. The method of taping the tests to a lined paper and watching the progression of the "T" line become darker over time is a very valuable tip especially for the first cycle. Wait for the line to get dark.. you'll know when it does. I downloaded both the easy @ home and the premom app to take 2 readings for my LH levels and sort of corroborate the levels rising toward ovulation. Natural lighting (white table & sunlight) seems like the best to take the app photos in - I found that the yellow bathroom lighting always returned a lower LH level. Good Luck Ladies!
customer_reviews.author: Mary O

customer_reviews.title: Simply the best
customer_reviews.text: Easiest thing ever! I had originally bought ovulation tests from Target but they were super expensive and hard to read. This is dummy proof, you pee in a cup, dip the stick. Once the stick has set for the app. time you snap a picture with the app and it tells you your level and tracks it. You can track sex and period in there as well. Would highly recommend! Had my IUD taken out last week of July and TTC now. Will report back!
customer_reviews.author: miranda Woodward

customer_reviews.title: Did not work for me.
customer_reviews.text: I never had a positive ovulation strip or a positive pregnancy. I went to my doctor and she told me I was ovulating. I ties two of these strips in one weekend. Once before memorial weekend and once afterwards because I do if I am going to drink. Both were negative. Three days late in my period I take another pregnancy test this time a different brand a DAY after I took one of these. I am pregnant. Just because it did not work for me does not mean it won’t work for you.
customer_reviews.author: nicole

customer_reviews.title: No frills, but they seemed to work!
customer_reviews.text: Sometimes these were a bit difficult to read- I had to pull out the instructions more than once to check on the lines. I got a lot of line readings that were not very clear (faint or lighter) and so I was unsure, but when the lines were very dark and easy to read then obviously I knew I was ovulating. These could be a bit messy and I certainly used a lot of them, but they were cost effective. I actually found out I was pregnant when using the pregnancy strips (which I confirmed later that day with a well-known brand), so I do think they work. I would try them again if I were trying to get pregnant.
customer_reviews.author: Lola

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy these pregnancy tests, they lie
customer_reviews.text: Extremely disappointed and angry. While the ovulation strips work wonderfully and have always been accurate, the pregnancy tests are extremely disappointing. We decided to test super easily at 7dpo and we got a dark positive on the pregnancy test strips. We tested for the next three days, 3 times a day and continued to get positives. We then tested with other brands to confirm and eventually went for a blood test and was not pregnant. I will never buy these again. An entire box of faulty tests.
customer_reviews.author: Christina Garlinger

customer_reviews.title: These are some of the best out there
customer_reviews.text: These are some of the best out there. However, if you are like me and drink a lot of water, your urine will almost never be concentrated enough to detect your LH surge- even with FMU. My advice for you heavy water drinkers is to keep drinking the water, as it important for healthy cervical mucus and test a lot throughout the day. If you can get a really yellow urine, you'll likely get an accurate test result. I tested a concentrated urine an hour after a previous negative test and it was very positive. Wouldn't have detected if I didn't do multiple tests a day with different urine concentrations.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: Defective. Every single test positive
customer_reviews.text: These strips are defective. Every single day I get a clearly positive ovulation test with these. I take a clear blue test and get my true result. I tested my husbands urine, who is a man and does not ovulate, and get positive. I tested water and get positive. Either this brand is a joke or I got a defective box. They are not expired. I'm going to try to get my money back
customer_reviews.author: Leila Joint

customer_reviews.title: Definitely Recommend
customer_reviews.text: Hubby and I decided to conceive after my tubes being tied for 14 years. Surgery in December. We started using this kit in February. We were pregnant on the first (chemical) and third month of using this kit. It makes it easy by taking the guesswork out of ovulation. We will welcome our little one Dec 2020.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: Great for PCOS
customer_reviews.text: We’ve been trying the ovulation strips for about two months. This month we have success! With PCOS I am lucky if I ovulate. This helped me pinpoint when I was. I like the app that comes with it too! My only complaint is the pregnancy tests. I got a very, very, very faint positive so I took another one. Also very faint positive. Both were taken with first pee of the day. At about 10:30 I took two from the store and they were clearly positive. Granted, I was only 7 DPO so maybe they’re just not good for early detection. Overall, I am very pleased with my purchase! It helps for sure!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pregnant in the first two weeks
customer_reviews.text: I stopped taking my birth control on 07/31/2020. I started tracking my ovulation on 8/22. Little did I know I was days away from ovulation. About a week or so after my Lh surge, my number started to rise again. I looked this up and saw that a positive ovulation test could mean pregnancy. I had taken a pregnancy test two days before and it was negative but I thought what the heck- there were 20 in the pack. I took one and IT WAS POSITIVE! I took another one and two digitals and we are pregnant! I didn’t even get halfway through this kit! It’s inexpensive and accurately tracks ovulation. HIGHLY RECOMMEND
customer_reviews.author: Kayla Dunn

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and very helpful. I have PCOS which makes baby making a bit of a tactical planning project. Had been trying for a few months without any pregnancy then bought this kit and was pregnant in about 2.5 months! Excellent buy. Worth every penny. I recommended it to my friend having issues with pregnancy and she also bought it and was pregnant within a couple months! Get this!! You won’t regret it!!
customer_reviews.author: Giancarlo

customer_reviews.title: Inconsistent
customer_reviews.text: I’m very disappointed with this batch. I used these strips in 2018 and conceived my son. The tests worked great. The batch I ordered this time around is horrible. Tests aren’t cut straight and the dye runs which makes it hard to tell if the test is positive or the dye is just running. I attached a picture of how inconsistent the test is. Very disappointed and will definitely check if the company could replace the batch.
customer_reviews.author: Lina

customer_reviews.title: Defective.
customer_reviews.text: HORRIBLE DEFECTIVE STRIPS!!!!! I’ve had strips before that were easy to use and accurate, this defective bunch doesn’t even show the test line after it’s been submerged in the urine for the exact time it’s supposed to. Whatever this is, it is utter defective junk. This complaint will hopefully get to the distributors, because I demand my money back! Very upsetting. I DO NOT RECOMMEND!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jaclyn Beck

customer_reviews.title: Buy it!!!
customer_reviews.text: I cant believe im even writing this right now. After 12 months of trying to get pregnant, my PCP reccomended we try premom and got pregnant first month using it! This product is the real deal. its extremely easy to to use and if you use it with their app its even better! Were so excited! So glad i bought this! Praying for a healthy baby 7/2020😊 good luck!!
customer_reviews.author: Valerie

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money on the expensive digital tests SAVE your ...
customer_reviews.text: Worked for us!! I purchased this product in November 2016 and by February 2017 I was pregnant!! I just gave birth to my gorgeous little girl on Halloween. I also used the clear blue digital along with the easy@home but I must say I trusted these more. I only tested once a day usually around noon and always received a accurate result. Don’t waste your money on the expensive digital tests SAVE your money and use these! Same goes for the pregnancy tests they are VERY accurate and sensitive enough to give you a early result, I tested positive a whole week BEFORE my missed period:) Baby dust to all!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Read invalid
customer_reviews.text: I’m really disappointed in these. I thought it was a great deal, but you get what you pay for I guess. I’ve used several ovulation strips this week and every single one of them read invalid. I know how ovulation strips work and am 100% sure I’m doing it correctly. Maybe I got the “lemon” box, but these don’t work for me. We have been trying for baby #2 and I don’t want to waste time on strips that don’t work!
customer_reviews.author: kamille

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: This kit worked amazingly. I highly recommend. The free app that goes along with it reads the ovulation tests & pinpoints whether you’re fertile or not & determines your peak day. It was more accurate than the fertility tracking on my iPhone. I used it for one cycle & got pregnant. The pregnancy tests are not early response (picks up hcg at 25), but I was still able to get a very faint positive at 9 dpo.
customer_reviews.author: Meagan R.

customer_reviews.title: Best ttc kit
customer_reviews.text: This is the cheapest ttc kit I have found. I use the app with it and love it. I’ve been offered free strips and still prefer to just buy these. They come with easy to understand instructions for the ovulation strips and the pregnancy tests. The ovulation test strips are read differently from typical pregnancy tests and are only positive after the test line is darker than the control line. Once you know that it’s pretty simple and the app will even give you a quantitative result so you know when your actual peak is. The tests coincide with my other fertility signs and bbt when I track it so I trust their accuracy.
customer_reviews.author: Jocelyn S.

customer_reviews.title: FALSE POSITIVE
customer_reviews.text: Like many other users I received a false positive. It was not faint, it was an obvious line. Do not buy this product. You will just have to buy another (accurate) test to confirm your pregnancy. Shame on this company for selling tests that they know give false positive results. It's devastating thinking you're pregnant only to find out the test you used was wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Good with a strategy
customer_reviews.text: These are a little hard to read. There is a way to use them to get a better accuracy. You need to use them everyday of the cycle after your period to really read what is happening. But when you are ovulating it’s hard to tell if your in full surge for sure. Still very good. Would recommend but you need to be looking at each strip together to really see the changes.
customer_reviews.author: rob

customer_reviews.title: Loved the Premom app
customer_reviews.text: It took us four months to conceive after using this product (the average healthy couple can take up to 6-12 months to get pregnant). I loved the app that went along with this product because it allowed you to take pictures of each test and it stored them all every month. This helped me compared my cycles. It also turns into a pregnancy app once you do conceive Easy and cheap! These strips picked up my pregnancy 9 DPO when a clear blue digital test read negative. Both clear blue and this product showed positive on 10 DPO. I will use this for future pregnancies
customer_reviews.author: Kelly V Poupard

customer_reviews.title: One little thing.
customer_reviews.text: Only thing I’d add, the instructions tell you to “dip the strip until you start to see the dye begin to rise into the testing window”, It May only be me but it took me a minute to figure out you have to keep the strip submerged until the die rises all the way to the top of the testing window.
customer_reviews.author: dani

customer_reviews.title: 100% Helped us concieve
customer_reviews.text: Well...positive pregnancy after 5 months of trying using ttc apps. First month after finally using these opk and turns out this may have been what we needed all along. The only reason I didn't give 5 stars is that the hcg tests don't register pregnancy early enough. However, after a positive First Response Early Response, I wanted to test again so I just use the LH strip and sure enough, positive. So, moral of the story is, this WILL help you conceive just be prepared to buy some extra prego tests if you're impatient like me :)
customer_reviews.author: Erin Darby Spencer

customer_reviews.title: It’s super afforadable and cheap test to buy before buying an actual test!
customer_reviews.text: This is amazing and easy to read. The app predict’s on when your about to ovulate and the test are easy to read. I’m happy it came with pregnancy test as well as now these day’s taking a test is expensive at the store. Definitely recommend it if your trying to plan for a family and you just got of birth control and needing to know when your going to ovulate.
customer_reviews.author: Angie

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Worst product ever! This is the second time this has happened to me with this damn brand! It’s the worst feeling ever!!! We’ve been ttc for the past 5 years and I got a false positive not once not twice but 3 times with this brand!!! Don’t waste your money! Buy the real brand. It’s so heartbreaking 🥺. All 3 of these where taking the same day. I don’t have a picture of the other false positive I got months ago.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: They work!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these in January and was pregnant by April, so I only used these 2 or 3 months before I got a positive pregnancy test. 23 weeks today!
customer_reviews.author: Dawn

customer_reviews.title: Received an entire bad batch.
customer_reviews.text: I used one pregnancy and two ovulation tests and all three were invalid. No lines at all, not even a control line. I read the instructions and followed them but nothing happened. Never had this happen with any other brand. Returning.
customer_reviews.author: Shopoholic131

customer_reviews.title: Affordable and accurate
customer_reviews.text: Only try one cycle! These test strips are affordable and accurate. My cycle is irregular and extremely long (50 days). So I got an ovulation app to keep it track. But it wasn't working. Then I got these test strips, and download the product app to start taking test. The app was able to tell the testing line was slightly darker than the other line. And 3 weeks after my ovulation day (2 days before my next period), I decided to try the pregnancy test. And I got clearly 2 lines, then I pull out one of the first aid digital early pregnancy test just to double confirm. It was also positive! So here we are, baby #2 is coming!
customer_reviews.author: John Chiu

customer_reviews.title: really great product
customer_reviews.text: Due to my age and the fact of just having cancer, I was given 12 months to both conceive and have a child before continuing cancer treatment. Before trying to conceive, I used these for a few months to track ovulation as best I could. I'm happy to say that within 8 weeks of trying, we are expecting a baby boy! I take that to mean the ovulation strips worked. I also used the pregnancy test ones as a 2nd form of test and they were accurate as well.
customer_reviews.author: Happy girl

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to use and frustrating if you have problems with ovulating.
customer_reviews.text: For those struggling with ovulating.... these are confusing. I never got a positive, which could just be me not ovulating, but these took forever to show results and 60% of the time would register as “0” with the Premom app. The pregnancy test was just about the same and by the time the test was done doing it’s thing.. like 10 min would elapse and I couldn’t trust any faint line that showed up because it was probably an evaporation line and when I’d test the next day... it would be a negative (on the pregnancy test strips).
customer_reviews.author: Jane

customer_reviews.title: Regarding the HCG strips
customer_reviews.text: This is a more a review for the hcg test strips included in the kit. It was able to detect hcg in my urine 4 days before my period was supposed to start! And what a good deal money wise! You get 20 hcg test strips which is WAY cheaper than buying 20 Clearblue pregnancy tests. For the ovulation test strips, I work variable shifts so it was hard to find a time of day I could take it consistently... I just used the Flo app to track my ovulation and that worked!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Olsen

customer_reviews.title: Will use again!
customer_reviews.text: We tried these for a month and it worked! I am currently 20 wks pregnant. The reason I gave 4 stars: I wasn't too impressed with the Premom app. It's not very user friendly, and the calendar is hard to read when scrolling through. You can barely read the months. There's not much for options for daily details (mood, period symptoms, pregnancy symptoms, etc).
customer_reviews.author: Rapunzel1986

customer_reviews.title: 100% must when ttc
customer_reviews.text: First, I want to thank all of the other woman on here for all of their reviews! They helped me tremendously when TTC. These ovulation sticks are a must! As you can see from my tests, I ovulate late. Without these sticks we would have missed my ovulation window. I used these sticks one month and I’m pregnant! 10/10 can’t recommend these strips enough!
customer_reviews.author: Jake H.

customer_reviews.title: Wow. I still can't believe it!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this bc i read the reviews.... The weird thing is that i wasn't really planning to get pregnant this month but it happened. i just wanted to know my ovulacion day.... my 1CD was on December 9 My peak day was on 16CD dec 24 2019 The only day i had a intercourse after peak day was dec 25 2019 (morning) I was waiting for my period on January 8 I did a pregnancy test on January 11. And was positive I used the app to know the LH test results is very easy to use And i did muy own paper with the strips like everyone else to see the progress. 100% recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Isabel juarez

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: I've only used the ovulation tracking for about a month but it's very easy to use. When scanned into the app, you'll get a numerical value for your levels and can plan for 'business time' appropriately. I was actually a little surprised as the Flo app that I use for tracking my period was about 3 days early for the ovulation prediction so hoping that these test strips will help us make a wonderful rugrat soon :)
customer_reviews.author: peddenka

customer_reviews.title: Helped me get pregnant in first month trying!
customer_reviews.text: I have PCOS. Went through IVF to conceive my daughter. Decided to try these before going through IVF again. I got pregnant my first month using them!! Another little girl on the way!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

product_meta.title: Easy@Home 50 Ovulation Test Strips and 20 Pregnancy Test Strips Combo Kit, (50 LH + 20 HCG)
feature_bullets: ✔Specially designed for “trying to conceive” women to get pregnant naturally: These Easy@Home ovulation tests give women a greater chance of predicting their most fertile days, even if their cycle lengths vary. Pregnancy tests can tell pregnancy sooner than a missed period. The Easy@Home 50 Ovulation Test Strips and 20 Pregnancy Test Strips Kit are supported by the FREE Premom Ovulation Predictor App.

✔The ovulation test strips help to track your ovulation progression, and minimize the chances of missing your LH surge. Levels of hCG as low as 25 mIU/ml (FDA cleared) can be detected in 5 minutes. Results are 99% accurate.
✔Easy to test: simply dip the test in your urine until the dye rises into the result window (approximately 5 - 10 seconds).
✔Easy to read: Ovulation tests -- a test line as dark or darker than the control line indicates a positive result. Pregnancy tests -- two lines means pregnant and one line means not pregnant.

✔100% customer satisfaction guaranteed: Contact our experienced and professional customer service by calling 1-855-822-6999 or email us with any questions you may have. Refunds or returns are acceptable by brand owner, who is dedicated to being the best provider of home health tests.

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
